Text: router[+2]  Purchased this router a few months back, NO PROBLEMS whatsoever.  WPA encryption[+1]  In fact, it supports the new WPA encryption standard, which is WAY better than WEP.  Works[+3][u]  Works perfectly with my netgear wireless PCMCIA.  Feature[+2][cc]  Feature wise, its a lot better than the dlink and netgear routers out there.
